fields.name: Abilties:
fields.value:
- Redirect a target to another target of your choice. (2 uses)
- Redirect a target to yourself, if they use a positive ability (like protection), attempt to transfur them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You fly! Roleblock and Redirect immune, the first time you would die you will instead lose this passive and survive.
